p:
The intensity data of a single-crystal (approx. 10 × 7 × 5 μm) were collected at room temperature on a D8 Quest Kappa X-ray diffractometer equipped with a Photon II detector (Bruker, USA). Monochromatic Cu- K
α radiation (λ equals 154.178 pm) was generated by a microfocus X-ray tube (Incoatec, Germany) combined with a multilayer optic. The software tools SAINT
56 and SADABS
38 were applied for data processing and multi-scan absorption correction, respectively.
